name: A Valve In Time
description:
A Valve in Time is a 3D puzzle game which has the player controlling an anthropomorphic panther time traveller called Valve. The objective is to help Valve escape the dinosaur ridden islands by completing puzzles that will open a portal to the next level. The deliverable that the team  produced is  a  game  with  one  complete level and  a second  visually  complete  level,  but coding and puzzle programming missing. 

The overall project aims to achieve three levels and a final level which will consist of a boss battle, in which the player must evade and run from a giant mechanical T-Rex by using shadow-walking to dodge its attacks, as well as swapping between past  and  present  time  states.  The  final  goal  is  to  complete  the  portal  and  escape  the  island forever.

Coding and mechanical design: Rayyan Gafoor

Voxel assets and environment: Michaela Bussey

Writing, UI, and music design: Juliette Love
